pageContext.claim: “Critical Race Theory is a Marxist doctrine. Oh you're so lucky that I'm your President because that was getting out of hand.”
pageContext.analysis: Richard Delgado and Jean Stefancic wrote the book on critical race theory. They define it as “a collection of activists and scholars interested in studying and transforming the relationship among race, racism, and power.” Moreover, it has become a widely accepted tool to understand contemporary America. Other than for purposes of fear mongering, it is not clear what Marx has to do with it.
